titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for Federal Civil Defense programs for fiscal year 1989.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nunn. With written report No. 100-338.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 659.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate struck all after the enacting clause and inserted the language of title 33, of S.2355, as amended. By Voice Vote.

vote.text: Passed Senate in lieu of S. 2355 (Title 33) with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/27/1988--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended, (Inserted Title XXXIII of S. 2355)) Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 for civil defense functions under the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950.
